set.name: CLB
set.longname: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

card.name: "Guild Artisan"
card.text: Commander creatures you own have "Whenever this creature attacks a player, if no other opponent has more life than that player, create two Treasure tokens." (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

card.name: "Guild Artisan"
card.text: Commander creatures you own have "Whenever this creature attacks a player, if no other opponent has more life than that player, create two Treasure tokens." (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

card.name: Ancient Brass Dragon
card.text: FlyingWhenever Ancient Brass Dragon deals combat damage to a player, roll a d20. When you do, put any number of target creature cards with mana value X or less from graveyards onto the battlefield under your control, where X is the result.

card.text: FlyingWhenever Ancient Brass Dragon deals combat damage to a player, roll a d20. When you do, put any number of target creature cards with mana value X or less from graveyards onto the battlefield under your control, where X is the result.

card.name: Arcane Signet
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

card.name: Astarion, the Decadent
card.text: Deathtouch, lifelinkAt the beginning of your end step, choose one —• Feed — Target opponent loses life equal to the amount of life they lost this turn.• Friends — You gain life equal to the amount of life you gained this turn.

card.text: {T}: Add {C}.{2}, {T}: Add X mana of any one color, where X is the number of other Gates you control.

card.text: {T}: Add {C}.{2}, {T}: Add X mana of any one color, where X is the number of other Gates you control.

card.name: Battle Angels of Tyr
card.text: Flying, myriadWhenever Battle Angels of Tyr deals combat damage to a player, draw a card if that player has more cards in hand than each other player. Then you create a Treasure token if that player controls more lands than each other player. Then you gain 3 life if that player has more life than each other player.

card.name: Battle Angels of Tyr
card.text: Flying, myriadWhenever Battle Angels of Tyr deals combat damage to a player, draw a card if that player has more cards in hand than each other player. Then you create a Treasure token if that player controls more lands than each other player. Then you gain 3 life if that player has more life than each other player.

card.name: Bhaal, Lord of Murder
card.text: As long as your life total is less than or equal to half your starting life total, Bhaal, Lord of Murder has indestructible.Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature and goad it.

card.name: Bramble Sovereign
card.text: Whenever another nontoken creature enters the battlefield, you may pay {1}{G}. If you do, that creature's controller creates a token that's a copy of that creature.

card.name: Command Tower
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

card.name: Criminal Past
card.text: Commander creatures you own have menace and "This creature gets +X/+0 where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard." (A creature with menace can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

card.name: Cultist of the Absolute
card.text: Commander creatures you own get +3/+3 and have flying, deathtouch, "Ward—Pay 3 life," and "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature."

card.name: Dynaheir, Invoker Adept
card.text: HasteYou may activate abilities of other creatures you control as though those creatures had haste.{T}: When you next activate an ability this turn by spending four or more mana to activate it, copy that ability. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Dynaheir, Invoker Adept
card.text: HasteYou may activate abilities of other creatures you control as though those creatures had haste.{T}: When you next activate an ability this turn by spending four or more mana to activate it, copy that ability. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Elder Brain
card.text: MenaceWhenever Elder Brain attacks a player, exile all cards from that player's hand, then they draw that many cards. You may play lands and cast spells from among the exiled cards for as long as they remain exiled. If you cast a spell this way, you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast it.

card.name: Elder Brain
card.text: MenaceWhenever Elder Brain attacks a player, exile all cards from that player's hand, then they draw that many cards. You may play lands and cast spells from among the exiled cards for as long as they remain exiled. If you cast a spell this way, you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast it.

You may play lands and cast spells from among the exiled cards for as long as they remain exiled. If you cast a spell this way, you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast it.

card.name: Elminster
card.text: Whenever you scry, the next instant or sorcery spell you cast this turn costs {X} less to cast, where X is the number of cards looked at while scrying this way.+2: Draw a card, then scry 2.−3: Exile the top card of your library. Create number of 1/1 blue Faerie Dragon creature tokens with flying equal to that card's mana value.Elminster can be your commander.

card.name: Elminster
card.text: Whenever you scry, the next instant or sorcery spell you cast this turn costs {X} less to cast, where X is the number of cards looked at while scrying this way.+2: Draw a card, then scry 2.−3: Exile the top card of your library. Create number of 1/1 blue Faerie Dragon creature tokens with flying equal to that card's mana value.Elminster can be your commander.

card.name: Faceless One
card.text: If Faceless One is your commander, choose a color before the game begins. Faceless One is the chosen color.Choose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)

card.name: Faldorn, Dread Wolf Herald
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell from exile or a land enters the battlefield under your control from exile, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.{1}, {T}, Discard a card: Exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn.

card.name: Fireball
card.text: This spell costs {1} more to cast for each target beyond the first.Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of targets.

card.name: Fireball
card.text: This spell costs {1} more to cast for each target beyond the first.Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of targets.

card.name: Firkraag, Cunning Instigator
card.text: Flying, hasteWhenever one or more Dragons you control attack an opponent, goad target creature that player controls.Whenever a creature deals combat damage to one of your opponents, if that creature had to attack this combat, you put a +1/+1 counter on Firkraag, Cunning Instigator and you draw a card.

card.name: Gale, Waterdeep Prodigy
card.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell from your hand, you may cast up to one target card of the other type from your graveyard. If a spell cast from your graveyard this way would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.Choose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)

card.name: Gale, Waterdeep Prodigy
card.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell from your hand, you may cast up to one target card of the other type from your graveyard. If a spell cast from your graveyard this way would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.Choose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)

card.name: Jaheira's Respite
card.text: Search your library for up to X basic land cards, where X is the number of creatures attacking you, put those cards onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

card.name: Jon Irenicus, Shattered One
card.text: At the beginning of you rend step, target opponent gains control of up to one target creature you control. Put two +1/+1 counters on it and tape it. It's goaded for the rest of the game and it gains "This creature can't be sacrificed." (It attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)Whenever a creature you own but don't control attacks, you draw a card.

card.name: Minsc & Boo, Timeless Heroes
card.text: When Minsc & Boo, Timeless Heroes enters the battlefield and at the beginning of your upkeep, you may create Boo, a legendary 1/1 red Hamster creature token with trample and haste.+1: Put three +1/+1 counters on up to one target creature with trample or haste.−2: Sacrifice a creature. When you do, Minsc & Boo, Timeless Heroes deals X damage to any target, where X is that creature's power. If the sacrificed creature was a Hamster, draw X cards.Minsc & Boo, Timeless Heroes can be your commander.

card.name: Noble Heritage
card.text: Commander creatures you own have "When this creature enters the battlefield and at the beginning of your upkeep, each player may put two +1/+1 counters on a creature they control. For each opponent who does, you gain protection from that player until your next turn." (You can't be targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything controlled by that player.)

card.name: Raised by Giants
card.text: Commander creatures you own have base power and toughness 10/10 and are Giants in addition to their other types.

card.name: Wand of Wonder
card.text: {4}, {T}: Roll a d20. Each opponent exiles cards from the top of their library until they exile an instant or sorcery card, then shuffles the rest into their library. You may cast up to X instant and/or sorcery spells from among cards exiled this way without paying their mana costs.1-9 | X is one10-19 | X is two.20 | X is three.

card.text: Choose one —• Run and Hide — Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to you and creatures you control this turn.• Gather Your Courage — Target creature gets +5/+5 and gains indestructible until end of turn. card.name: Zevlor, Elturel Exile
card.text: Haste{2}, {T}: When you next cast an instant or sorcery spell that targets only a single opponent or a single permanent an opponent controls this turn, for each other opponent, choose that player or a permanent they control, copy that spell, and the copy targets the chosen player or permanent.
